net.floodlightcontroller.core

Interface IOFConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IOFMessageWriter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IOFConnectionBackend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullConnection, OFConnection

    public interface IOFConnection
extends IOFMessageWriter
    Contract for an openflow connection to a switch. Provides message write and request/response handling capabilities.
    Author:
    Andreas Wundsam

        org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFactory getOFFactory()
